<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Coffee Ordering</title>
    <style>
body {
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            background-color: #000000;
        }

        header {
            background-color: #8eb50b;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 1em;
            text-align: center;
        }

        section {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-around;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            padding: 1em;
        }

        .menu-item {
            border: 1px solid #ddd;
            border-radius: 5px;
            margin: 1em;
            padding: 1em;
            text-align: center;
            background-color: #fff;
            box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }

        .menu-item img {
            max-width: 100%;
            height: auto;
        }

        .cart {
            background-color: #fff;
            border: 1px solid #ddd;
            border-radius: 5px;
            box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
            padding: 1em;
            position: fixed;
            right: 1em;
            top: 1em;
            max-width: 300px;
            width: 100%;
            z-index: 999;
        }

        .cart-item {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            margin-bottom: 0.5em;
        }

        footer {
            background-color: #8eb50b;
            color: #fff;
            padding: 1em;
            text-align: center;
            position: fixed;
            bottom: 0;
            width: 100%;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

    <header>
        <h1>Coffee Menu</h1>
    </header>

    <section id="menu">
        <!-- Menu items will be dynamically added here using JavaScript -->
    </section>

    <div class="cart" id="cart">
        <h2>Shopping Cart</h2>
        <div id="cart-items">
            <!-- Cart items will be dynamically added here using JavaScript -->
        </div>
        <p>Total: &#8377<span id="total">0.00</span></p>
        <button onclick="checkout()">Checkout</button>
    </div>

    <footer>
        <p>&copy; 2023 Coffee Ordering</p>
    </footer>

    <script>
// Sample coffee menu data
    const coffeeMenu = [
        { id: 1, name: 'Espresso', description: "a type of strong black coffee that's created  </br> when hot water is forced through ground coffee beans.", price: 2.99, imageUrl: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,' },
        { id: 2, name: 'Latte', description: 'Coffee with steamed milk and a small amount of foam.', price: 4.99, imageUrl: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,' },
        { id: 3, name: 'Cappuccino', description: 'Perfect balance of espresso, steamed milk & foam.', price: 3.99, imageUrl: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,' },
        { id: 4, name: 'Americano', description: 'Diluted espresso with hot water, similar to drip coffee.', price: 3.49, imageUrl: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,' },
        { id: 5, name: 'Iced Coffee', description: 'Chilled coffee served over ice.', price: 3.99, imageUrl: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,' },
        { id: 6, name: 'Mocha', description: 'Espresso with steamed milk and chocolate.', price: 4.49, imageUrl: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,' },
        { id: 7, name: 'Flat White', description: 'Coffee with microfoam steamed milk.', price: 4.29, imageUrl: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,' },
        { id: 8, name: 'Macchiato', description: 'Espresso with a small amount of frothy milk.', price: 3.79, imageUrl: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,' },
        { id: 9, name: 'Affogato', description: 'Espresso poured over a scoop of vanilla ice cream.', price: 5.99, imageUrl: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,' },
        { id: 10, name: 'Turkish Coffee', description: 'Finely ground coffee beans with spices, served unfiltered.', price: 4.99, imageUrl: 'data:image/jpeg;base64,' },
        // Add more coffee items as needed
    ];

    // ... (rest of the script remains unchanged)


        // Initialize menu and cart
        const menuSection = document.getElementById('menu');
        const cartItemsContainer = document.getElementById('cart-items');
        const totalElement = document.getElementById('total');
        let cart = [];

        // Add coffee items dynamically
        coffeeMenu.forEach(item => {
            const coffeeItem = document.createElement('div');
            coffeeItem.classList.add('menu-item');
            coffeeItem.innerHTML = `
                <img src="${item.imageUrl}" alt="${item.name}">
                <h2>${item.name}</h2>
                <p>${item.description}</p>
                <p> &#8377 ${item.price.toFixed(2)}</p>
                <button onclick="addToCart(${item.id})">Add to Cart</button>
            `;
            menuSection.appendChild(coffeeItem);
        });
// Add item to cart
        function addToCart(itemId) {
            const selectedCoffee = coffeeMenu.find(item => item.id === itemId);
            cart.push(selectedCoffee);
            updateCart();
        }
